If your expected annual return on staking is 4.5%, your real cost of paying pool operators a 5% fee is really 0.225% PER YEAR (4.5% * 0.05).   So instead of getting 4.5% per year you get 4.275%.   In #crypto, your DAILY fluctuations range anywhere from 1-18%. #Cardano $ADA #SKY
